Articles.Content:
Hello everybody! i am a new rocketeer over here!

I am from Argentina, and i have my brother in this forum (he invited me to play KSP)

I hope we all get along and get KSP to the max in this forum! i haven't met you guys yet but i think you are awesome.

Best Regards

Spectre

Welcome SpectreBubble! We have a very good community here who are very friendly and helpful.

Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Hola, hombre! Tu hermano te hizo ningÃƒÂºn favor. Su vida pertenece a Jeb, ahora.

Did someone say "to the Max"?! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Welcome aboard!

Hello SpectreBubble, and welcome.

I just got back from a weekend away from keyboard. =)

Couldn't have joined at a better time! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Get ready for 1.0, and welcome to the Kerbal Space Program Forum!
Welcome to what I think is the best community in the world. Enjoy your stay!
Thanks to everybody! i would quote them all, but that would make a veeery long message ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Come on, QUOTE US ALL! QUOTE US ALL! QUOTE US AL.... Guys?
